features: 2 in 1 Floor Scrub Brush with Squeegee : floor scrub brush with stiff bristle + rubber squeegee; Brush + scrape steps to easily remove the stain, stubborn grime, dirty water, and dust.Cleaning the floor, use a scrub brush with strong bristles and a rubber squeegee to remove any remaining water stains. Newly upgraded in 2023, the handle length has been increased from 44" to 51.4", and the material upgrade is tighter and stronger and more durable, effectively solving the problem of breakage and length.ARAINY 2 in 1 floor brush scrubber is a good helper for your life

Strong Cleaning Ability：Stiff Bristle Floor Scrub Brushes with 120°pivoting V Shaped Brush Head and strong bristles targets grouts lines in between tile,and a rubber squeegee to remove any remaining water stains and foams. Hard Bristle V-Shaped Corner Brush Cleaner is perfect for those hard to reach corner cleaning.

Extended Handle and Detachable : Floor scrub brush with long handle. The length of the tile grout brushes pole is 51.4 inch and 9 inch brush head can be removed and easy to install.The brush head and the handle are in threaded connection which is not easy to loosen.

Sturdy and Easy Storage:The brush head and the handle are in threaded connection which is not easy to loosen. High-quality PVC stiff bristles and a stainless-steel handle, making it both high-quality and long-lasting. Shower Floor Scrubber for Cleaning stiff bristle brush also has a built-in hole in the handle for simple hanging on a hook, and the V-Shape bristles can maintain their shape for a long-lasting cleaning effect.
Multi-occasion Use: Grout Scrub brush with long handle is for cleaning tiles, swimming pools, kitchens, windows, glass, fish tanks, etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Upgrade your cleaning routine with the newly upgraded ARAINY 2 in 1 floor brush scrubber. In 2023, we've made significant improvements to provide you with a better cleaning experience. One of the major upgrades is the increased handle length, now measuring 51.4 inches. This extra length allows for easier reach and more comfortable cleaning. Say goodbye to bending and straining while scrubbing floors. Not only is the handle longer, but we have also made significant material upgrades. The new materials used in the construction of this scrubber are tighter, stronger, and more durable than ever before. This effectively solves the problem of breakage and ensures a longer lifespan for your cleaning tool.

50% Cleaning Time Saving Flexible 120° rotating head to for easier cleaning 9.1 inch Brush Head Big brush head with 9.1 inch length for more easier brushing and labor-saving cleaning time. Brush Head Type Detachable brush head design for easy cleaning basin, faucet counter top, etc.

V-shape Design Special for Crevices, Gaps and Corners Cleaning Premium 4.5cm (1.78inch) thin brush head with v-shape stiff bristles fit easily in small gaps and crevice. V Shaped Brush Head with strong bristles targets grouts lines in between tile,and a rubber squeegee to remove any remaining water stains.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Hopeful when I bought it. Skeptical when I received it. Happy now that I've used it. It is a very lightweight aluminum pole and it is short. I am 6ft and it works without me bending a lot. I bought this for cleaning grout. I use toilet bowl cleaner and a brush (hand brush until this). I applied the cleaner, let it set, and while not having to be on my hands and knees scrubbing, was able to remove all dirt. I was able to scrub the corners where wall meets tile too since mop sucks there. Overall, I am very happy. My only worry is strength of the pole.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Rod feels a little flimsy
reviews.reviewText: Rod feels a little flimsy and brush is smaller than anticipated but works great to take off grime from shower.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for tile shower!
reviews.reviewText: This thing is a life saver for your back. It is long enough and sturdy enough to clean my all tile shower without killing my back. Amazing purchase for sure!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Useful tool, fragile metal pole
reviews.reviewText: Useful tool to help clean bathroom, windows, etc. Angled brush helpful to clean corners, grout lines. Concern metal pole will rust eventually. It also seems fragile & easy to bend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was so excited to get this because I've been fighting to clean the grout in my house without having to get down and scrub like Cinderella. So here are my lists of pros and cons:Cons: flimsy handle that constantly untwistsThe scrub head has a plastic attachment that snaps on to the handle. This was not a tight fit at all and it continuously fell off, so I had to reach my hands in the hot mop water to fish it out.It was not sturdy enough at all. When using the scrub side, it fell apart. The squeegee was ok, but again, fell off.The pros? After I spent over an hour trying to scrub just my kitchen, it's clean! But I had to get down on my hands and knees to scrub it.All in all. Dont waste your money. I'd attach a photo, but I got so mad at this thing falling apart that I literally threw it out of the garage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality floor scrubber tool that works very well!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Got this for our standing shower to clean up corners and also for floor grout cleaning. Considering this for the price factor and this is very good for such needs. Overall functional & would highly recommend it for its price.My 2 cents below:Pros:- Very functional tool & a must for any home cleaning needs- Good quality tool with a metallic build- Heavy duty & durable build quality- Easy to use & handle as the handles are long enough- Easy to assembly as it comes in a few pieces only- Reasonably priced in the competition for the quality & functionalityCons:- None that I see for this price and the quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Good brush, terrible handle/pivot
reviews.reviewText: The brush on this scrubber is very hearty, however the pivoting head does not stay locked in place, so it keeps shifting side to side while trying to scrub. The metal of the handle is also flimsy, so it gives a bit when scrubbing. Returned because it was more aggravation than it was worth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: To scrub grouting in the kitchen and bathroom
The product is sturdy and gold quality for the price you pay

It was worked only for first time. Super cleaned my washroom in first use. From 2nd time it was not working as expected. Brush is very low quality. After 2 uses the brush was damaged. Not worth the price.

reviews.reviewTitle: Didn't use this product for one week it broke
reviews.reviewText: Useless product waste of money and time.
